name: Now Trends consultancy
description:
At Now Trends Consultancy, we believe that matching the right client with the right candidate is more than just matching skills to the requirements of the job. 
We are a London based fashion & retail recruitment agency with an international presence in the field. Our unique method of matching the perfect candidate to the perfect job is designed to provide the most satisfactory recruitment experience to both clients and candidates.

Our focus is on matching talented fashion and retail professionals across all levels from middle management to board level to available openings. Whether it is a permanent role, a temporary position, or a contract, we offer personalized and bespoke services which makes the hiring and recruitment process extremely efficient and painless. Partnering with leading brands, retailers, stores and suppliers in the fashion and retail industry, we provide the most ideal recruitment in design, production, marketing, technical, retail, wholesale and management.

jobs.title: store manager
jobs.description:
Job Description
On behalf of our client, we are looking for an exceptional Luxury Store Manager to work for their store in Prague, as a Maternity Cover. Our client is a globally well known brand and they are specialised in selling luxury lingerie.

Responsibilities:

- Maintain store performance by coaching and disciplining employees, planning, monitoring, and appraising job results

- Producing staff rotas, ensuring appropriate cover at all times and liaising with Head of Retail to arrange extra staff

- Co-ordinating daily meetings, appointment planning and reports

- Overseeing stock takes

- Managing the merchandising of the store to ensure cabinets are full and well organised

- Arranging special promotions, displays and events

- Working closely with the Head of Retail Operations to implement and review procedural or strategic changes.

Profile:

- 4-5 years experience within the Luxury Retail and Fashion

- Must be available for 12 months

- Goal setting, organisational skill, delegation, communication skill, result-driven

- Sales floor and time management, decision making

- Ability to develop and train members of the team

- Commercial thinker and results focused

- Proactive and a proven self-starter

- Attention to detail

- Experience of working in a fast paced environment

Salary: CZK56,000 - 58,000 + management bonus

Language: Fluent Czech and English

Job Types: Full-time, Contract

Salary: 57,000.00Kč /year

jobs.title: supervisor
jobs.description:
Job Description
On behalf of our client, we are looking for an exceptional Supervisor to work for their store in Stuttgart. Our Client is globally well-known and specialised in selling luxury lingerie.

Responsibilities:

Assisting the Store Manager on sales target achievement, customer service improvement, operation and business development
Maintain the level of service provision within the team, lead and grow the potential of the team of sales associates with coaching and mentoring methods
Provide training for the team in regards to product training and expertise
Maintain the grooming level of the team
Working towards personal and store KPI achievement
Drive CRM with different clienteling tools, increase customer retention and VIP customers
Bring in new clients through networking
Acting as a brand ambassador at all times
Assist and take initiatives in projects in-store to drive sales
Handle customer service issues professionally
Shop floor management, maintain visual merchandising standard, inventory management and shop floor tidiness
Ensure all processes are meeting the company policy and standard, as well as complying with the health and safety policy at all times
Profile:

3 years experience within the Luxury Retail and Fashion
Goal setting, organisational skills, communication skills and result-driven
Sales floor and time management with decision making ability
Ability to develop and train members of the team
Commercial thinker and results focused
Proactive and a proven self-starter
Attention to detail
Salary: up to €28,000 + 1.5% individual commission and quarterly bonus

Language: Fluent German and English

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent

Salary: 28,000.00€ /year
